Download a set of data from the US Census API

fetch_data.Rd

Download a set of data from the US Census API

Usage

fetch_data(
  variables,
  year,
  for_geo,
  for_items,
  survey_type,
  table_or_survey_code,
  ...,
  use_key = TRUE
)

Arguments

variables

a vector of variable names, like "B01001_001E"

year

an integer year, e.g. 2021L

for_geo

the geographical level the data will describe, e.g. "tract"

for_items

the specific instances of for_geo desired, e.g. "*" or "000200"

survey_type

e.g. "acs" or "dec"

table_or_survey_code

e.g. "acs5" or "pl"

...

<dynamic dots> other items to pass to the query

use_key

optional, should the query include a Census API key from the system environment. Defaults to TRUE

Value

a tibble with "Group", "Index", "Value", and "Year" fields, as well as one field for each geography.

See also

build_api_url()
